website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Fresh Foam 1080 v9 has gathered several positive reviews about the sizing, style, and cushioning. Though there were criticisms about the shoe’s fit and price, overall, the shoe is still considered as efficient running footwear. The shoe has promising features but there is still a room for improvement.
pros: Many users agreed that the New Balance Fresh Foam 1080 v9 runs true to size
A couple of wearers noticed that the 9th version of the Fresh Foam 1080 feels significantly lighter than the older version
Some runners thought the shoe was stylish
According to several users, the New Balance 1080 v9 is a comfortable running shoe
A few consumers were delighted by the shoe’s wide and extra wide width options
A number of buyers admired the comfortable cushioning of the New Balance Fresh Foam 1080 v9
cons: The New Balance 1080 v9 is a bit expensive
One user expressed disappointments because he developed a blister in the heel area after the first run
Another purchaser noticed a strange fit in the heel section

customer_reviews.title: Buy other trainers!
customer_reviews.text: 99% sure these are fake. Love a bit of 'fresh OAM' and excessive glue.. NOT
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe they're New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I am convinced these are fake and I am returning them. The box, packaging and shoes do NOT exude quality. I have 3 other NB runners and love the brand. I am sceptical about these and hence, returning them
customer_reviews.author: eoin mcgettigan

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The show has perfect fit, light and after running 25 km feels even better. I think a slightly different help cushion will make road runs more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Demetris

customer_reviews.title: Really bad sole
customer_reviews.text: Used it to run once on soft soil surface and had a terrible back/hip pain afterwards. Also after a long walk I notice that my feet start to hurt. That's the worst NB shoe I have ever had. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: leuchtturm

customer_reviews.title: Check inside
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the trainers for the 2nd time my right heel got very sore! I had a blister as there was a tear on the high inside of right trainer! Lovely running shoes but very disappointed with the tear and discomfort I've had!
customer_reviews.author: John gilmurray

customer_reviews.title: Great service thanks
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about them not being genuine, but they are. Great shoe great price. Wear asics 8.5 and these are 9.5
customer_reviews.author: Just Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seriously good long distance shoe for training. Maybe not for racing as there does feel like energy lost through the extra cushioning
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sacchi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have used New Balance running shoes for some years, the most recent being 1080v8. These are a good fit, very comfortable and have created no issues for my feet after a 10k and a 5k run.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit, quality well made running shoe. Buy 1/2 size larger for perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ian L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoes. Still getting used to them but I can feel the difference and the extra support. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Argiolas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but the mesh wears through in next to no time. After a year light use only in the gym (never worn outdoors), left foot is breaking through mesh on the side and in another month will be joined by right little toe. Absolute tragedy and waste of money on comfortable but very costly runners. So annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: lullaboo

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam 1080v9 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: New Balance updated their popular Fresh Foam 1080v9 performance shoe with data collected from real runners. The result: Unmatched comfort via a full-length Fresh Foam midsole, presented in a premium double jacquard upper. - 8 mm drop: due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 8 mm drop are approximate - Ortholite insole and sockliner - Bootie construction for a custom like fit - Engineered mesh - Blown rubber outsole
feature_bullets: New Engineered 2 Layer Jacquard Mesh - Provides ventilation which keeps the feet feeling cool and dry.
Bootie Construction - Delivers a soft, irritant free wrap.
No-Sew Material - Reduces the risk of irritation and discomfort.
Plush Collar - For a comfortable fit.
Ortholite Premium Insole - Offers step in comfort for a plush feel.
